attributes.additional_details:
This petition if passed would enable trial cannabis dispensary's to open in Stirling for the duration of 3 years, enabling anyone with a prescription from their gp to buy cannabis legally.

The legal amount to posess 1 oz
Legal number of plants for cultivation 3

Cannabis is less harmful than cigarettes and alcohol and can be used for many medical issues. If passed government are entitled to tax 15% tax per purchase enhancing our economy. Crime rate would fall dramatically saving police time to concentrate on more serious crimes. Together we can make a diffrence. Together we must say yes to the legalisation of cannabis.
